languages.text: "Твои сомнения — лишь очередное испытание. Следуй своей стезе, и она развеет их".

traits.locale_text: "Твои сомнения — лишь очередное испытание. Следуй своей стезе, и она она поможет развеять их".

languages.text: "These doubts are merely another trial for you to overcome. Follow your thread, and they will be dispelled."
languages.original_text: "Твои сомнения — лишь очередное испытание. Следуй своей стезе, и она развеет их".

traits.locale_text: "Your doubts are just another trial for you to overcome. Follow your way, and they will be dispelled."
"Your doubts are just another trial for you to overcome. Follow your way, and they will be dispelled."
"These doubts are merely another trial for you to overcome. Follow your way, and they will be dispelled."
"These doubts are merely another trial for you to overcome. Follow your way, and they will be dispelled."
"These doubts are merely another trial for you to overcome. Follow your thread, and they will be dispelled."
"These doubts are merely another trial for you to overcome. Follow your thread, and they will be dispelled."

languages.text: «Esas dudas no son más que otra prueba que ha de superar. Siga su hilo y terminarán por disiparse».
languages.original_text: "These doubts are merely another trial for you to overcome. Follow your thread, and they will be dispelled."

traits.locale_text: «Esas dudas no son más que otra prueba que ha de superar. Siga su hilo y terminarán por disiparse».

languages.text: 「このような疑念は、あなたが克服しなければならない試練のひとつにすぎない。自分の糸を辿れば、それらは払拭されるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "These doubts are merely another trial for you to overcome. Follow your thread, and they will be dispelled."

traits.locale_text: 「このような疑念は、あなたが克服しなければならない試練のひとつにすぎない。自分の糸を辿れば、それらは払拭されるでしょう」

languages.text: “你心中的疑惑，不过是你需要克服的另一个试炼而已。跟随你的丝线前进，这些疑惑就会随风而散。”
languages.original_text: "These doubts are merely another trial for you to overcome. Follow your thread, and they will be dispelled."

traits.locale_text: “你心中的疑惑，不过是你需要克服的另一个试炼而已。跟随你的丝线前进，这些疑惑就会随风而散。”

languages.text: "Diese Zweifel sind nur eine weitere Prüfung, die Ihr meistern müsst. Folgt Eurem Faden, dann werden sie verschwinden."
languages.original_text: "These doubts are merely another trial for you to overcome. Follow your thread, and they will be dispelled."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Zweifel sind nur eine weitere Prüfung, die Ihr meistern müsst. Folgt Eurem Faden, dann werden sie verschwinden."

languages.text: « Ces doutes ne sont jamais qu'une nouvelle épreuve à surmonter. Suivez votre fil, et ils se dissiperont d'eux-mêmes. »
languages.original_text: "These doubts are merely another trial for you to overcome. Follow your thread, and they will be dispelled."

traits.locale_text: « Ces doutes ne sont jamais qu'une nouvelle épreuve à surmonter. Suivez votre fil, et ils se dissiperont d'eux-mêmes. »

languages.text: "Hissettiğin bu kuşkular, aşman gereken bir başka sınavdan ibaret. İpliğini takip edersen kuşkuların da ortadan kalkacaktır."
languages.original_text: "These doubts are merely another trial for you to overcome. Follow your thread, and they will be dispelled."
